Remarks: {{doc.remarks}}
The products covered in this document are required to be kept upright, in a well-ventilated place away from sunlight, and at temperature below 30 Celsius.
• The food mention in this invoice is warranted for it’s nature & quality which is purpose to be.
• Our risk and responsibility cease on dispatch of the goods from our godown.
• Goods once sold will not taken back.
• SUBJECT TO BHAVNAGAR JURISDICTION 		• Payment must be maid by crossed cheque or draft payable at Bhavnagar as per terms, after that interest will be charged @ 21% on the total Value of Invoice.
• Complaints regarding breakage, shortage should be intimated immediately on receipt and claim should be lodged with carriers without delay. 		For, {{doc.company}}
